about_the_game:
Embark on an exhilarating journey in Blast 3D: The Arrival Demo, where players are thrust into a captivating open-world adventure. Explore exotic locations teeming with mystery and danger as you navigate through stunning landscapes and uncover hidden secrets.

With an array of diverse enemies lurking around every corner, prepare to test your skills and wit in heart-pounding encounters. From towering behemoths to agile adversaries, each foe presents a unique challenge that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Immerse yourself in the breathtaking 3D environment, where every corner holds the promise of discovery and every encounter pushes you closer to the heart of the action. Are you ready to embark on this thrilling journey and conquer the unknown? Download Blast 3D: The Arrival Demo now and experience the adventure of a lifetime.

Note that this is a demo version of the game soo:
Unbalanced enemies
Missing sounds/effects/locations
Limited access to world exploration
Limited functionality
Lack of content and storyline as well as missing cinematics

All of the above and so much more will be present in Pre-release version of the game which you can buy very soon
